title: [DOC] Making easibility in reading of ICBM 152 description
[DOC] Making easibility in reading of ICBM 152 description

text:
The see also addition is awesome! 

Why is the splitlines needed?

> To make description a bit easy to read. Without splitlines it looks a bit occupied.

But splitlines is returning a list of strings, instead of a string, so
there is a change in type, and I don't understand why we should be
printing lists of strings instead of strings.

> Why is the splitlines needed? 

To make description a bit easy to read. Without splitlines it looks a bit occupied.

> But splitlines is returning a list of strings, instead of a string, so there is a change in type, and I don't understand why we should be printing lists of strings instead of strings.

Ok. I will find some other alternative.
